page.title: 14MEDIA-NEWSPAPERS
page.content: Most of the people in this village have weekly news papers.The most popular papers are Western Gazette (produced in Yeovil) and the Central Somerset Gazette(produced in Wells). They have those papers for the local news and sport. The very local news is in "Tidings",a parish magazine produced by the church and printed in the school.It contains a letter from the vicar and details of services for the month.It also tells us what has been happening in the villages, such as whist drives,Wednesday Club, W.I.meetings and so on. This month's magazine contains an account of the P.T.A.Carnival.This is organised by the Parent Teacher Association to raise money for the school.
